attributes.action: Bring back the 3 R's - Right Wrong and Respect!!
attributes.additional_details: In a world that grows ever more abrasive and uncaring and violent let's try and teach people to start respecting themselves and society. Show that not abiding by the rule of law has consequences. By all mean give people their rights but not without expecting them to take responsibility

rejection.details: Please can you clarify what specific action you require the Government to take.
